front.title: IEEE Standard for AC High Voltage Circuit Switchers rated 15.5kV through 245kV

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This Standard is applicable to AC circuit switchers designed for outdoor installation and for rated power frequencies of 50 and 60 Hz and rated maximum voltages of 15.5 kV through 245 kV. It is only applicable to three-pole circuit switchers for use in three-phase systems. This Standard is also applicable to the operating devices of circuit switchers and to their auxiliary equipment.
